articles.title: Will your flight get canceled? Shutdown sparks travel chaos
articles.summary: If you want to avoid potential delays or cancellations, some airlines are offering waivers allowing travelers to change their flights without paying change fees or fare differences. Major carriers, including American Airlines, Delta Air Lines, Frontier Airlines, JetBlue, Southwest Airlines and United Airlines, have waivers in place related to the flight reduction. Contributing: Nathan Diller, Bart Jansen, James Powel, Jeanine Santucci and Zach Wichter, USA TODAY, and Reuters
